scripts.start: cross-env TZ=America/Sao_Paulo && cross-env NODE_ENV=development && ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.dev: cross-env TZ=America/Sao_Paulo && cross-env NODE_ENV=development && nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.prod: cross-env TZ=America/Sao_Paulo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production && ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.debug: cross-env TZ=America/Sao_Paulo && cross-env NODE_ENV=development && ts-node --inspect src/server.ts
